Html:
For my main hand item I only have Dragonwrath selected. When I go to run the optimizer I get the following:

---------------------------
Optimizer Warning
---------------------------
The following slots have a very large number of items selected:

  Main Hand Items

 Do you want to continue with the optimization?
---------------------------
OK   Cancel  
---------------------------

Repro:

1. Create a new character in Rawr.
2. Tell Rawr to load from Battle.NET.
3. Load any mage with DW equipped. (I verified that it wasn't just me - this repros with both Dresden of Destromath and Rylai of Destromath.)
4. Attempt to start optimizer.

Is this a known issue?
It's a known "issue", it's safe to ignore. If you don't want to click you can disable the warning in the options.
